parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Distance between theses two parallel faces

parameters.name: PartnerFaceDisp
parameters.description: Face on the original part body used in generating the neutral face

title: IMidSurface3.IGetNextFacePair
description: Gets the next pair of parallel faces in this midsurface feature and the thickness (in meters) between the two faces.
signature:
Face2 IGetNextFacePair( 
   out System.Double
Thickness
,
   out Face2
PartnerFaceDisp
)

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Distance between theses two parallel faces

parameters.name: PartnerFaceDisp
parameters.description: Face on the original part body used in generating the neutral face

returns: Face on the original part body used in generating the neutral face
remarks:
The two faces returned are the two parallel faces from the original part body that were used to generate the neutral face in this midsurface feature.
Call
IMidSurface3::IGetFirstFacePair
to get the first pair of faces used in this midsurface feature.
This method is similar to
IMidSurface3::IGetNextFace
, except this method does not return the neutral face.
